workspaceId.description: Workspace numeric identifier. Null if the Studio belongs to the user context.

parentCheckpoint.description: Information about the parent checkpoint if this Studio was created from an existing checkpoint.
parentCheckpoint.title: DataStudioDto.ParentCheckpoint

studioUrl.description: URL to access the running Studio session.

computeEnv.description: Compute environment information where the Studio runs.
computeEnv.title: DataStudioComputeEnvDto

template.description: Container image template information for the Studio environment.

repository.description: Container image repository URL for the template.

icon.description: URL to the template icon image.

tool.description: Tool name or type provided by this template (e.g., 'jupyter', 'rstudio', 'vscode').

template.title: DataStudioTemplate

configuration.description: Studio resource allocation and environment configuration.

gpu.description: Number of GPUs allocated to the Studio session.

cpu.description: Number of CPUs allocated to the Studio session.

memory.description: Amount of memory in MiB allocated to the Studio session.

mountData.description: Array of data-link IDs mounted in the Studio session.

environment.description: Array of environment variable key-value pairs set in the Studio session.

condaEnvironment.description: Conda package specification for custom packages installed in the Studio environment.

lifespanHours.description: Number of hours the Studio session will run before automatically stopping. A value of `0` indicates unlimited lifespan.

configuration.title: DataStudioConfiguration

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the Studio was created.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the Studio was last updated.

lastStarted.description: Timestamp when the Studio session was last started.

effectiveLifespanHours.description: Total accumulated lifespan hours for the Studio session, including any extensions.

activeConnections.description: Array of currently active user connections to the Studio session.

status.description: Current Studio session status. Possible values: `stopped`, `starting`, `running`, `stopping`, `failed`, `building`, `buildFailed`.
status.title: DataStudioStatus

isPrivate.description: If true, only the Studio creator can connect to the session.

id.description: Data-link string identifier. Generated based on provider, type, region, and resource path.

name.description: Name of the data-link (e.g., bucket name).

description.description: Description of the data-link. Null for data-links auto-discovered from workspace credentials.

resourceRef.description: Resource path for the data-link, including the URI scheme (e.g., `s3://my-bucket`, `gs://my-bucket`, `az://account.container`).

provider.description: Cloud provider for the data-link. Supports `aws`, `google`, `azure`, `azure_entra`, `azure-cloud`, `seqeracompute`, and `s3`.
provider.title: DataLinkProvider

region.description: Cloud region of the data-link (e.g., `us-east-1`, `europe-west1`). May be null for some providers.

credentials.description: Array of credentials that can access this data-link. Empty for public data-links.

publicAccessible.description: Whether the data-link is publicly accessible without credentials.

hidden.description: Visibility status flag. If `true`, data-link is hidden from default list views.

status.description: Status of the data-link. Can be `VALID` or `INVALID`. Set to `INVALID` when associated credentials are deleted.

message.description: Error message for invalid data-links. Null for valid data-links.
Human-readable message describing the current progress step.

progress.description: Studio session startup progress information, including build status and checkpoint mounting progress.

resource.description: Whether this is a resource label (applied to workflow tasks for compute resource allocation).

isDefault.description: Whether this label is automatically applied to new resources by default.

isDynamic.description: Whether this label's value can be dynamically computed from workflow metadata.

isInterpolated.description: Whether this label contains interpolated variables resolved at runtime.

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the label was created.

items.description: Label object for categorizing and organizing resources (workflows, pipelines, compute environments, actions, datasets).
items.title: LabelDbDto

labels.description: Array of resource labels applied to the Studio.

totalSize.description: Total number of Studios matching the query criteria.

404.description: NotFound, when the workspace is not found or when the API is disabled for the workspace.
